description:
Depreciation of value when you buy a car is inevitable, but can you
limit your losses? Is it true that Toyotas and Volkswagens hold their
value? What does high mileage do to a car’s value?

Let’s leave aesthetics and preferences aside and use real data to see
what really determines the price of a car on the second hand market.

This session will cover:

* How to make spiders using Portia and scrapy to extract data from Irish
  car websites
* The use of simhash to find duplicates in different datasets.
* How to use pandas to analyse and plot scraped data.
title: Cut your losses! How to use web scraping to analyse Ireland's used car market
